SimilarGroups.SimilarityNote: All requirements focus on facilitating local engagement for older adults through recommendations and notifications about social activities.
SimilarGroups.DifferenceNote: Requirement 1 emphasizes tailored recommendations based on health status, while Requirement 2 focuses on general discovery of events, and Requirement 3 involves subtle notifications that respect user independence.

UnifiedRequirement.Name: Personalized Local Engagement Support
UnifiedRequirement.Description: The system shall provide tailored recommendations and notifications for local events and activities that promote community engagement for older adults, considering their preferences and health status while respecting their independence.
